author: lgawron
msg: every instruction is being notified of end of parsing. No more Parser dependency on StartDefine.
We can introduce configurable tag set now.

author: lgawron
msg: Factor out macro calling to StartCall class. It is a little bit messy not but will clear out as soon as it will also start to support jx:call macro="name" statement.

author: upayavira
msg: This merges all changes from 2.1 into 2.2. We can now use
2.2 docs as the basis for the new documentation system.
The remaining changes are 2.2 specific, which is how it
